metadata.name: Serpentine #1/5
metadata.description:
5 editions by Hulki Okan Tabak, Serpentine smart contract Manifold deployed, 2022

...

Once, I found myself wandering through a serpentine desert, a surreal world of red and crimson skies. The heat was oppressive, and I was starting to lose hope of ever finding my way out.

As I trudged through the endless dunes, I couldn't help but feel a sense of death lurking in the air. The sun beat down on me mercilessly, and my mouth was dry as the sands beneath my feet.

But just when I thought I couldn't take it any longer, I saw a glimmer of hope on the horizon. A faint green oasis, shimmering in the distance.

I redoubled my efforts, driven by the promise of life and sustenance. And as I drew closer to the oasis, I could feel the cool embrace of its waters, beckoning me to safety.

I collapsed onto the banks, my parched throat finally quenched by the sweet nectar of the oasis. And as I lay there, surrounded by the beauty of the desert, I knew that I had been reborn. The serpentine path had led me to a new beginning, one filled with hope and possibility.
